pages.text: $(l)$(item)Celestial Focus$() - is a primitive construct that holds $(l:elementalamulets:artifacts/all_seeing_lens)$(thing)All-Seeing lens$() in it.$(br2)When placed on the top of Elemental Combinator, boosts it by x2
There is one condition that may affect the boost:$(li)When there is a full moon in the sky, the effect is not x2, but x3
